data.description: Perl implementation of the TLMP toolkit
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
TLMP is a Perl implementation of the TLMP toolkit/component set,
    see http://www.solucorp.qc.ca/tlmp/

    TLMP improves code reusability by using XML-like tags to re-use
    "components". These tags are interpreted to automatically subclass
    the component and implement the specific methods.
